Name: Rebirth:Beware of Mr.Wang
About the game: This is a plot-oriented interactive puzzle game. The gameplay uses mouse clicks or drag-and-drop methods to promote the development of the plot. The game tells the story of an ordinary young man's love in life. The protagonist is an introverted young man who has been single for more than 20 years and has a beautiful longing for love. By chance, he met that he liked the goddess. After getting encouragement from his friends in the game, he decided to confess to the goddess, and since then he worked hard and studied hard. The game has a lot of illustrations and interesting interactions. If you like this kind of game, please don't hesitate to place an order and buy it!
